name: Ultimate decision making tool
description:
Some decisions are hard to make.

There might be situations where 2 people or 2 teams are supporting 2 different options and none of them want to let go. This proven framework is here to help you making hard calls!


The file contains 4 different variants depending on the level of importance you attach to the decision you are trying to take.


  • Cheap (3x3) -> connect 3
  • Moderate (4x4) -> connect 4
  • Serious (5x5) -> connect 4
  • Life & death (5x7) -> connect 4
